item.title: Proposed Trump policy could force thousands of citizens applying for social security benefits to verify their identities in person
item.description: While the move could potentially protect against fraud, it could also cause long wait times and mass disruption.

item.title: 4 health benefits of rosemary, including a hidden compound scientists could potentially use to fight Alzheimer’s
item.description: Here’s how to take advantage of this natural health powerhouse.

item.title: Exclusive: Superlawyer David Boies expected to hit Boeing with wrongful death suit spurred by suicide of whistleblower John Barnett
item.description: Boeing whistleblower Barnett "wasn't looking for anything for himself," Boies says. "He was just looking to make airplanes safe."

item.title: Billionaire investor Ray Dalio credits all his success to meditation: ‘It gives you a calmness’
item.description: There are big benefits for the body and brain.

item.title: Bill Gates reportedly warned Trump his foundation won’t be able to fund global health gaps if the administration keeps making major cuts
item.description: Gates Foundation officials have previously said “no foundation” can effectively replace the U.S. government’s foreign aid funding.
